```{r setup}
library(moranajp)
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r import_data, setup}
neko <- 
  rvest::read_html("https://www.konekono-heya.com/books/wagahai1.html") %>%
  rvest::html_element("body") %>% 
  rvest::html_text2() %>%
  stringr::str_split("\\r|\\n") %>%
  .[[1]] %>%
  .[13:length(.)] %>%
  tibble::tibble(text=.) %>%
  dplyr::filter(text!="")
neko
```
